title: Electro-chemical studies of Zn doped nickel oxide nanoparticles synthesized via solution combustion method using green and chemical fuels
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17664-17674
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01706D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
N. Nasir Ahamed, Jayadev Pattar, M. R. Anil Kumar, N. Basavaraju, N. Raghavendra, Sharanakumar T. M., C. R. Ravikumar, H. C. Ananda Murthy
This study presents a new green solution combustion method (aloe vera gel extract as fuel) and chemical method (glucose as fuel) to synthesise Zn-doped nickel oxide nanoparticles (Zn:NiO NPs).
